targets.expr: 1 - (netdata_disk_space_GiB_average{job="$job_netdata", instance="$instance", dimension="avail"} / ignoring(dimension) (netdata_disk_space_GiB_average{job="$job_netdata", instance="$instance", dimension="avail"} + ignoring(dimension) netdata_disk_space_GiB_average{job="$job_netdata", instance="$instance", dimension="used"} + ignoring(dimension) netdata_disk_space_GiB_average{job="$job_netdata", instance="$instance", dimension="reserved for root"}))

panels.description: Requires `RECORDINGS_METRICS_READ_FROM_DISK` to be enabled on the BigBlueButton Exporter
panels.title: Recordings Unprocessed

panels.description: Buckets (Y axis) represents the number of participants while the count in each bucket represents the number of rooms with that particular bucket's value.
panels.title: Heatmap of Room Participants

panels.description: Buckets (Y axis) represents the number of listeners while the count in each bucket represents the number of rooms with that particular bucket's value.
panels.title: Heatmap of Listeners Participants

panels.description: Buckets (Y axis) represents the number of voice participants while the count in each bucket represents the number of rooms with that particular bucket's value.
panels.title: Heatmap of Voice Participants

panels.description: Buckets (Y axis) represents the number of video participants while the count in each bucket represents the number of rooms with that particular bucket's value.
panels.title: Heatmap of Video Participants

targets.expr: sum(histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(bbb_api_latency_bucket{job="$job", instance="$instance"}[5m])) by (le, instance, endpoint, parameters))) by (instance)
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(bbb_api_latency_bucket{job="$job", endpoint="getRecordings", parameters="state=processing", instance="$instance"}[5m])) by (le, instance))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(bbb_api_latency_bucket{job="$job", endpoint="getRecordings", parameters="state=processed", instance="$instance"}[5m])) by (le, instance))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(bbb_api_latency_bucket{job="$job", endpoint="getRecordings", parameters="state=published", instance="$instance"}[5m])) by (le, instance))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(bbb_api_latency_bucket{job="$job", endpoint="getRecordings", parameters="state=unpublished", instance="$instance"}[5m])) by (le, instance))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(bbb_api_latency_bucket{job="$job", endpoint="getRecordings", parameters="state=deleted", instance="$instance"}[5m])) by (le, instance))
